title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 30 August 2013 - XWiki
content:
<sdumitriu1> has quit  
01:16 <Slashman> has quit  
01:21 <irctc806> has quit  
04:56 <polx\_> has joined #xwiki  
04:58 <polx> has quit  
04:58 <polx\_> is now known as <polx>  
07:38 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
07:44 <polx> has quit  
07:44 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
08:11 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:34 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
08:44 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:45 <sburjan> vmassol: good morning  
09:49 <vmassol> gm  
10:35 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:15 <camil7> has joined #xwiki  
11:19 <camil7> there is a small issue at XWIKI-9408  - maybe an easy fix for todays BFD ;)  
11:19 <camil7> I would send a pull request, but I guess it is much less effort if someone with direct git access just adds that missing css-class  
11:24 <vmassol> camil7: yep, I'm planning to fix it  
11:24 <vmassol> (although it's not considered a bug ATM)  
11:27 <camil7> ah, I see, because I did not report it as a bug, it is not included in the BFD stats ...  
11:27 <vmassol> I'll change it to a bug don't worry ;)  
12:25 <sburjan> vmassol: so after the integration of Workspace sin XE, XEM will disappear ?  
12:29 <polx\_> has joined #xwiki  
12:32 <polx> has quit  
12:32 <polx\_> is now known as <polx>  
12:40 <tmortagne> has quit  
12:41 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
13:19 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
13:21 <polx> has quit  
13:22 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
13:47 <vmassol> sburjan: yes  
13:49 <sburjan> vmassol: so you estimate that by the end of the year we will stop building an releasing manager ?  
14:23 <vmassol> ep  
14:23 <vmassol> yep  
14:29 <Inge-> uogrades will be easier?  
14:30 <vmassol> not related  
14:30 <vmassol> they're already easy  
14:30 <vmassol> :)  
14:30 <Inge-> heh  
14:30 <vmassol> (with the DW)  
14:39 <sdumitriu> has quit  
14:41 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
14:43 <camil7> has anyone tried building xwiki with the -Pdebug profile for better JS-debugging recently?  
14:43 <vmassol> camil7: nope, it's not working?  
14:43 <camil7> after I deploy I get an error that xwiki-min.js cannot be loaded  
14:44 <camil7> if I copy resources/js/xwiki/xwiki.js  to resources/js/xwiki/xwiki-min.js  in the deployed webapp  
14:44 <camil7> the xwiki-min.js is found, but then I get some errors out of the prototype library ... just wondering if that is just me  
15:55 <tmortagne> has quit  
16:46 <polx> has quit  
17:13 <sburjan> has quit  
17:14 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
17:44 <vmassol> going to restart xwiki.org  
17:44 <vmassol> testing something  
17:48 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
17:49 <tmortagne> has quit  
17:49 <tmortagne1> has joined #xwiki  
17:51 <Mariah> has quit  
18:09 <sdumitriu1> has joined #xwiki  
18:18 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
18:20 <polx> has quit  
18:33 <evalica> has quit  
19:15 <sburjan`> has quit  
19:26 <Slashman> has quit  
19:49 <tmortagne1> has quit  
20:05 <camil7> meh, the xwiki.js and xwiki-min,js are quite different files, that was the source of the problem; xwiki-min.js contains a lot of files  
20:05 <camil7> that is why me trying to "replace"  the missing xwiki-min.js with xwiki.js after building with -Pdebug  failed  
20:07 <camil7> instead manually running mvn net.alchim31.maven:yuicompressor-maven-plugin:compress  and copy the generated xwiki-min.js into the webapp has delivered "fast enough" turnaround time for me  
20:07 <camil7> has quit  
20:27 <vmassol> has quit  
20:29 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
22:17 <vmassol> has quit  
23:33 <sdumitriu1> has quit
